website_summaries.verdict: An eye-catching set of flameless candles made of real wax and embellished with a birchwood pattern.
pros: Flickering flames and a real wax exterior provide a pleasingly realistic effect
Comes with 3 candles of varying heights
Features 4 auto off and on timer options
Boasts an overall shelf life of up to 50,000 hours
cons: Real wax may melt if left in direct sunlight or another heat source

customer_reviews.title: Love the flickering candles
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alternative to those really expensive flickering candles. Since no one has shown a video I have one to share.
customer_reviews.author: Life in NE WA State

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t your average flameless candles- they are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Wow- these a such an improvement on the usual frameless candles. I am so impressed with them they look soooo real! I put them inside of a chiminea in a condo that says fire is a no no. Wanted a fire look that we could enjoy indoor or out. I’m very pleased. The only bad part was one candle was broken upon arrival, I need them now for a party, so I’m not bothering returning. I’ll deal with 1 bad egg out of the bunch. My video doesn’t do them justice they look even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: V. H.

customer_reviews.title: Really lovely buy
customer_reviews.text: These candles are wonderful. I wish they had more girth, but they are plenty long enough. The candles themselves do not come with batteries, but the remote does. You'll need 18 AA's (you're welcome), but the batteries will last a good length of time. You set them for x-number of hours when you turn them on, then leave them on and they will come on at the same time every night until you reset the time. They are dimmable and you can set them to flicker or not. These are way better quality than some similar ones I was gifted. Anyway, really lovely buy and I'll be back for more, especially if any thicker ones are available.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Great candles!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a house with tons of windows in the entryway. We wanted Christmas candles in each window. These candles really light up the season. I love the remote controls and the “candle” function. They really flicker and seem like real candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and the remote is easy to use. They come with two remotes so that you can separate the set to keep some in different rooms. I really like that they're real wax, but that they won't melt, and are not a fire hazard. In fact, I'm so pleased with them that I'm writing my first Amazon review about them.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, safe, scent-free ambiance
customer_reviews.text: These come individually wrapped so the candle-wax surface of the product is safe/unscratched. Each one takes two double-A batteries. This set has two remote controls, but it seems that both control any and all candles you point toward. I tried out the candle vs light settings; dimming and brightening settings; and the two-hour setting. Great! These are wonderful and set up a nice ambiance in my guest room/library without fear of burning the place down. There's no scent to mess with my migraines or hurt my birds' sensitive air sacs... These are perfect. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy Author Sandy Lender

customer_reviews.title: If my wife hadn’t been here I would have tossed them all over the hill!
customer_reviews.text: First time out of the box I chose the candle in the middle, then...! It seems nothing is made with any quality anymore. What a shame. I’m afraid to try the other four candles now. But, I am a glutton for punishment. How do you give something a minus rating?
customer_reviews.author: Sir Macey

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than expected, but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these candles for holders on our mantel. I was shocked at how skinny they were, which was my fault for not realizing they are 2.2 inches wide (not the usual 3 inches). These didn't work for my original purpose, but turned out to be perfect for other areas of the house. It's nice to be able to cluster these thin candles for a different look.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Love these flameless candles!
customer_reviews.text: I have two new kittens and don’t like having flamed candles or real fires in the fireplace. These flameless candles work perfectly and look great! So nice to be able to turn on/off by remote control (or timer). They create the perfect comfy cozy ambience for dark rainy nights here in the Pacific Northwest.
customer_reviews.author: CFF

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: This is update from previous review, I have to say the customer service from Vinkor was fantastic, I ordered this candle and when I received it would not work properly and sent it back and posted my problem as I have several other of these from other manufacturers on never a problem the next day I received a email asking if they could replace the problem candle and two days later I received a new candle now that is EXCELLENT customer service (something that is rare today) I would definitely recommend Vinkor.
customer_reviews.author: runner

customer_reviews.title: One off color
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is that there is one candle with a very noticeable differing color than the others. They all have a beautiful yellow glow but one is orange. The picture tones it down but it’s a lot more noticeable in real life to the point that I probably won’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Realistic Candles set the perfect holiday mood!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are amazing! They flicker and are wax coated so they feel and look realistic. I have 3 curious Maine Coon kittens, so real candles are out of the question. These are perfect, and I LOVE the remote and timer which controls all of them at one time! I utilized these candles in my 5 ft. long dining table centerpiece during a recent casual Christmas dinner and they were stunning. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cris H.

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: My wife , in a nursing home for the duration , loves watching the candle flicker -- as does her 99 year old room mate. The remote control on/off is a great feature as she cannot get up unassisted to turn it off. If it makes her happy and have a more enjoyable life , I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: charles w swinford

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: So Luminara candles are the best, but you are looking at these for the same reason I did, these are much cheaper. These are a good substitute, they are cheaper made but they still look pretty realistic. The worst thing about these is you can hear the flames moving, it’s like a clicking sound, I can deal with it as I usually have the Telly on anyway. If money was no object I would by Luminara but I would buy these again as a more affordable imitation. If you listen carefully to my video you can here the clicking.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Harding

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! Work great with timer and love the flickering candle option.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: All nine candles function perfectly. The remote control does what it supposed to do. The delivery was fast (I used prime). I put my candles in the chimney because I don’t really burn wood in it, and it look beautiful! Overall, I’m very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Darling

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap Looking - Non-returnable item!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Very cheap looking. Be warned - these are non-returnable. Did not know that was a thing for a prime item. Thankfully, Amazon refunded our purchase price since we are Prime members. We will likely just drop them off at Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: D. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a whim. Quality is much better than expected. From a distance they are quite realistic looking.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Most realistic I've Seen
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and so realistic! I put the "candle" on a nice candle stand I had and you would never know unless you walked up close and looked that it wasn't real. Plus the convenience of the remote! I am going to buy one for my mother-in-law because she loves candles but fears fire. This will work great for her. All the ambiance and none of the worry. That's a lot of satisfaction for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie L. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand why these are an Amazon Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these candles for some holiday use. I figured at the price they wouldn't be the greatest, but I did expect them to work. On the two smallest candles, the battery cover would not stay closed after the batteries were inserted. The candles have a much smaller diameter than a lot of others I have seen and the flame isn't quite as pretty as it is in the picture. They would have been ok for holiday decoration if they had all worked.
customer_reviews.author: Maggy H

customer_reviews.title: Best candles ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice! They look so real! Really wish they were 2 inches exactly so they fit right in my candle holders but they work! Love them and the remote is amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Trusoul4u

customer_reviews.title: Remote NOT Working..
customer_reviews.text: Nice candles, they're made of real wax/look real. They were a good deal price-wise. My only two issues.. The remote does not work on them. It's not a huge deal as you can turn them on/off manually from the small switch on the surface of each candle, where the batteries go in.. Also, this being my first experience buying flameless candles like these.. When you go with a darker color (VS White /Cream/Ect), the white 'flame' is very visible/obvious during the daytime/when not in use. That part looks very 'fake-y', if that bothers you. But overall, a good price for the real wax look, the amount of candles you get, and how they look when they're lit. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Saj

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and very realistic with the flickering option
customer_reviews.text: The candles look amazing and I love the timer, I have mine scheduled to come on for 4 hours at night and they really create a nice ambiance in my living room. The flickering setting looks very realistic and with the timer settings, you don't have to worry too much about replacing the batteries too often. I like that it comes in several different sizes and you can set them up as you like around the room or all of them together above your fireplace. I bought some before that were made with cheap materials and lasted a month only but these are heavier, so hopefully, they will last a while. I will update in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Hall

customer_reviews.title: Just Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are great. I am so impressed with how real the flame looks --- very much like my much more expensive Luminares. I like all the different settings on the remote -- and was surprised to see they are dimmable. I do wish there were a 10-hour option as that is what I have always used on other candles. The price is terrific. I would also like to see more short candles to put inside candle jars, etc. Also, there is no clicking noise to the flame (silent!) as noted with some other brands here. Can't go wrong with this set. I am seriously considereding ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Rita M.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous, be careful in case the batteries may burn out inside candle
customer_reviews.text: Omg..when I had the batteries in and turned it on it wouldnt turn on so I opened it to check if I inserted the batteries correctly it burned my fingers. The batteries were burning hot and it started to pop and make sizzling noises. It looked like some kind of liquid was coming out. I didnt dare get the batteries out anymore since its burned and charred.Also I didnt want to start a fire so I'm waiting a couple minutes before tossing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kylene

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! They make my simple little apartment look so cozy and homey. They do make little tapping sounds but it's really quiet and I like it because I like background noise. I put them in my fire place behind the fire guard and it looks perfect. Why not use real candles? So I can leave them on without fear of fire and there's no mess of wax all over my fire place. When i walk in my house i see a fuzzy carpet with a fire place full of red glowing candles. Hands down one of my favorite things about my home.
customer_reviews.author: Beetlejuicy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service response and a new set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set in December 2016 - loved them and got so many positive comments on how realistic they looked. BUT, they lasted a very short time and the they would not flicker. I carefully read the directions and did everything I could including reaching out to the company but did not get a response. However, when I wrote a negative review explaining what happened, they reached out to me and offered to send me a new set which I happily received. I really think these are so lovely and hope they will provide many, many hours of beautiful and realistic candlelight. And I definitely appreciate the customer service team's response to my previous experience!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, look like real candles, timer a must. These candles have it all.
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted flicker candles that look like real candles, and I finally found them. I love the timer. So many choices on how much time you want them on. Best buy I ever did..
customer_reviews.author: Paula Dooley

customer_reviews.title: 3 Of 9 Orange Like a Pumpkin
customer_reviews.text: Don't have any complaints as far as looks before turned on. Real wax, nice looking, packaged really well so no knicks. My main complaint is that although these are really nice, I can't use these all in the same area because some are very orange while some are more of a white hue. I have to split them up between orange and white and the orange are the smaller candles making my display look off balance. Will update after I talk to customer service. Would be five stars if they all were the same color but 1/3 of the package failing isn't very promising.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Helen Miriad Booth

customer_reviews.title: Yes, yes, yes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been scouring the Internet for flameless candles that are realistic-looking, remote-controlled and inexpensive enough to buy in bulk. (This is for a wedding under a tent where real candles are not allowed.) These Vinkor candles are terrific on all three counts. They’re far less expensive than comparable flameless candles, especially the larger sets that include 5 candles in various sizes for $19.99 or 9 for $39.99. They’re also unscented (yay!), a lovely ivory color and the dancing flame looks realistic even up close. Vinkor — I wish you’d make these in tea-light size as well. I’d buy dozens!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Ok product and with the remote control, you can choose to have a standard light or a flickering light. The set comes with two remote controls as well. Some of my candles came looking “warped.” These are still made of real wax I believe, with lights put inside. And the wax definitely had marks/dents on in, or the candle wax had bent in areas. The set i received don’t look perfect at all, but for where I’m putting them, it’s ok. Wouldnt suggest if you’re expecting all of the candles to look smooth and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cabe

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set and loved them so much bought another.. great for Halloween décor. I normally turned them on and off but one night decided to set timer to turn them off in 2 hours. worked like a charm. what I didn't know was setting it up that way made them come on again in 24 hours. it was a bit spooky sitting in living room and all 18 start popping on one by one. but love that feature.. maybe should have read instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great candles, super value! Adjustable timers! LONG BATTERY LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: Update 1/3/20: We used these candles for nearly 7 weeks this holiday season. The AA batteries lasted the entire time. 6 hours a day for 45 days or 270 hours, way beyond my expectations! This set is so good, that we purchased a second one just days later. Used the 3 largest candles in a large ceramic pumpkin at our front entrance for the month of October. Nice bright flickering light. The timers (set for 6 hours) worked flawlessly and the batteries show little deterioration for 180 hours of operation in relatively cool temperatures. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FHG

customer_reviews.title: Very good ...better than I thought
customer_reviews.text: These are really good in a remote control works great. you have to point the remote control right at them. If you set them down too hard they will come on and then you have to use the switch on the bottom to turn them off and back on to get the remote control to work. But these are very good better than I thought
customer_reviews.author: MakoTx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel, home or even outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: Despite having to spend a small fortune in batteries (beware!), the variety of sizes in this set makes it well worth the money! Have not yet used the timer feature, but find the remote control easy to use. We created a romantic ambiance for our anniversary at an old inn where real candles weren't an option, setting up two locations each with their own remote control (2 remotes are included). We've since used them on our patio at night, and even around the bathtub. Just be sure to turn off candles at the base to conserve battery life when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: momshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Is there a nice set of candles but the thing is is that you have to really figure out that you paid $25 for the candles but then you turn around and have to pay $21 just for the batteries so what I think they should do is include the batteries in the price so that's one reason why I didn't give it five stars because I had to pay $25 for the the candles and then I had to go out and pay almost at least $21 for the batteries so that's thrown in raise the price on them but they are nice looking candle
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Decent value for the money great for ambience
customer_reviews.text: 2 of these didn’t work as soon as they arrived due to busted springs that wouldn’t hold the batteries. Not super bright, but had a ton of fun with my 2 year old hiding the remote and pretending mommy was magic turning them on. Like that it comes with 2 remotes. Great for hygge ambience and can be mixed and matched in several ways. Love the cozy feeling they give a room just wish they were a little brighter and that they had all worked. Would have been a great value for the money if they had all worked, but maybe I just got lemons and that’s on me for being too impatient to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Codie Goad

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and really look impressive
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with care and fast! Quality is great. Gently open and close them. I had no problems-gently knocking on some of them is from plastic hitting plastic backing in candle. Cut up a piece of bandaide and stuck it in for quick fix. Wax and light look awesome and you can control all the candles with one remote and pointing at them = it picks up what you point at(range) so I spaced my candles out to control them ( I feel like a harry potter witch) Will buy more soon!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. I got the ivory candles where you can clearly see the flame - yes they look realistic and are amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: JS.KiMoss

customer_reviews.title: Pretty effect for good price
customer_reviews.text: These candles were even better than I expected! Two remote controls (in case you want to break up the set and use in two different rooms) that control the timer feature, the brightness of the candles, and whether they are steady or flickering. a great value for the price! I had looked at something similar in a local store, and it would have cost me about three times more to get the same number of candles. A tip: for a less uniform flickering and a more natural look, take a few candles into a different room and get them started. Then the candles will flicker more naturally and not so synchronized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are misleading of flame
customer_reviews.text: These candles have a plastic flame on a wire and an LED shines against the plastic flame. It looks nothing like the image. ALSO NO RETURNS ON THIS ITEM which is not listed anywhere on the description.
customer_reviews.author: TheBearAndMe

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel like real candles
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that they were slimmer and smaller than in picture. However, they worked well and have a beautiful soft glow. You can use lit up or with candle effect. I put all my Christmas things away except for the candles. I will be using those year round. Overall, extremely happy with their function. Made my appetizer table very pretty and it was safe for people to move around the table without being injured with real candles. I would like these offered with bigger diameters and taller options in a group as these were. But then you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: VIOLA IBARRA

customer_reviews.title: Timer Feature is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the excellent quality of these candles for the price. After reading other reviews I knew the diameter would be smaller than standard pillars and wasn't sure how they would look but I really like them. I created three small groupings among my Christmas decorations that look stunning. The wax is smooth and very realistic and the candle color is warm. I love the timer feature which allowed me to set them to come on at a certain time and relax knowing they'll turn themselves off so I'm not wasting battery power. Can't speak to battery life since I've only been using them for a week but still running thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most realistic flickering of all remote candles I own; Remote never worked or it'd be 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The remote never worked , which is a but annoying. That's the only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars. Once they're on , they are the best and most realistic in terms of the flickering aspect of the numerous other remote candles I own. I got them to accompany my Dragon knives and Targaryen collection (hence the red.) The only downside, again - the remote, which is nonexistent. Other than that. very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Gorilla Warrior

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: We loved these so much we bought another set! Sure, I love real candles but living on a ranch with canyon evening breezes it is hard to keep the flame unless in a hurricane glass. These are perfect for our large wood deck. We tuck them all over for great lighting! Fun in planters, around the garden path, and so much more! One tip though, don't leave them out in the sun they will melt/deform- lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: FS Ranch

customer_reviews.title: One candle arrived defective, extra battery backing floating in box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought white flameless candles recently from a different seller and they are just absolutely perfect. I found these red candles to look and feel very similar to the white ones. These candles are taller and skinnier. I gave it a shot and was excited to try out a different style. Strangely, I had an extra backing floating in the box that did not belong to any of the candles. One of the candles was defective and the flame was stuck inside of the candle. I would not buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia4realia

customer_reviews.title: So lovely!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was against the purchase but now he loves the candles 😂 They are so awesome! Totally look real! Nobody knows the flame is fake. They make our place look amazing. Highly recommended! The remote is an awesome feature 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Mariya Mar

customer_reviews.title: Two Remotes! Unscented! Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift, but I set them up, put in batteries, etc. I hadn't realized the set had two remotes!!!!! Score!!!!! And I didn't see mentioned they seem to be unscented, it was a gamble, as the recipient can't do fragrant candles. It's too soon to review on longevity, but I am more than happy with this purchase,! Did I mention the remotes use weird round batteries, but they are included????? I am impressed. My sister was thrilled!!
customer_reviews.author: ptl4now

customer_reviews.title: orange light not candle light
customer_reviews.text: we have these over our mantel with rough and tumble kids I don't trust open flames so we bought these as a compromise and yes I do like them and do recommend them they are not "lifelike" flames they don't flicker like some on the market do they are great value for the money the tallest one is a little awkward but I pushed ot to the back so no one could really see it and it works
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Flameless Until you put the battery in a defective one...
customer_reviews.text: So, in 2 orders (one a replacement) there is always 1 or more defective. The second replacement order the larger candle one literally burned my finger, smoked and was very unexpected. Hurt a lot. They have flame on the wrong end... If you like taking chances only having part of the set working then this set is for you! Especially the unexpected flame smoke coming from the battery compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Delware Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not as realistic as video reviews from other buyers
customer_reviews.text: I had to have these after seeing video reviews. They looked so realistic. Mine are nowhere near as fantastic. Yes, they're pretty but it's your typical fake bulb looking "flame". One does not flicker at all. The rest flicker together at the same times so it's more of a pulsating synch when together, not very realistic at all. I don't know why there is such a discrepancy in quality from other buyers but I am not impressed. I could have paid $12 for the same set around the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: J.P,

customer_reviews.title: Perfect additions to set the ambiance!
customer_reviews.text: Love these candles! I cannot believe how realistic they look! The only con I have found is my cable remote seems to communicate with the candles cause them to turn on and off when hitting certain buttons. Not enough of an issue for me to think any less of the quality of the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but DO NOT come with batteries
customer_reviews.text: These are great but DO NOT come with batteries... Each candle takes two AA. The remotes do come with batteries at least. I was so excited to get these, but had to wait to use until I got a big package of batteries. Would rather pay more and have them come with batteries. Otherwise, they look beautiful, function very well, and are actually waxy on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gondor

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about these candles. I purchased two different sets. I thought they would be great along a stairwell. I set them on a timer, and they run for about6 hours during the night. Within one week they don’t work. They need new batteries! I have spent more money on batteries than the candles!! I wish I could get my money back!! DO NOT BUY unless you have the extra money to continue buying batteries!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful set! I can really turn off all the lights in my room and just leave these on! The fact that they’re made out of real wax and the fake flame wiggles back-and-forth gives is such a realistic touch! The lights even slightly dim as real candles would. They are so versatile and could be used for not only home decor but may be for events especially for Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C

customer_reviews.title: The remote features breaks
customer_reviews.text: I thought the candles are lovely and wanted to be able to "set and forget." Unfortunately, after about a month, some control in the candles began failing. When that happens, the candle flashes like a strobe. It cannot be changed and fails on every setting. Two have failed at which point I take out the batteries and throw them away. They are unreliable and worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: very small and not the realistic flame as the others sold on this product page
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 9 candle set. These came quicky and adequately packaged however, they are very narrow at 2". They DONT have the same realistic flame as the others sold on the same product page. It is the rubbery fake flame that produces a light that flickers on and off at intervals to look like there is the light of a flame but not the dancing flame itself. At $29 I'll keep them but would not encourage anyone to buy them. Pretty much junk.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles for ambiance without having to worry about open flames
customer_reviews.text: I think this a great set of flameless candles. The set comes with two remotes, so you can easily split the set between two different spots in your house and locate a remote near each. The flickering effect is nice. It's not necessarily as realistic as a real flame, but it's nice. There is a dimmer option on the remote which also adds to their versatility. I suggest getting rechargeable batteries for them if you plan to use them a lot. Each candle takes 2 AA batteries, so even rechargeable batteries for them is quite an investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kohout

customer_reviews.title: Timer does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: The 2, 4, 6, and 8 hour timer does not work. Very disappointing. I will turn it on in the evening and hope my husband remembers to turn in off. I will be looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Granger

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, I really love the look, feel, and ambiance of these flameless candles. When you turn them on to flicker they start off synced but after a few seconds, they begin to randomize a bit more so when they're on together they have a pretty effect. I've been on the market for a set of flameless candles for a while now and after much research, trial and error, and disappointment, these finally met my expectations and despite little flaws, I could not be happier with this purchase. Best of all they look just as great during the day, or when they're turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive candles, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the candles in the set was broken on arrival - I could hear loose wires when I went to put batteries in it - so I contacted the company. Within a few days a new set of candles arrived, so I couldn't be more pleased. The set comes with two remote controls, handy if you are inclined to misplace a remote or if you want to split the candles up into two different displays. I have paid more for heavier, and I presume better quality, candles, but I am quite satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: J in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Candles if Only They All Worked
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these sets of candles for Christmas gifts. 3 our of the 4 sets purchased malfunctioned shortly after they were put into use. In each instance one of the three candles did not light up, even with brand new batteries. The flame flickers, but no light. Very disappointed because I really love how these candles look when they all are lit, unfortunately I am now stuck with a set of two working candles instead of three. It is past the return window, so I really have no way of replacing the candle that doesn't light. Would not not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice except for one small problem.
customer_reviews.text: They really are beautiful, lovely and bright and the remote works perfectly. The only disappointing thing is that one of the candles as you can see in the picture has malfunctioned and the light that should be in the little flame seems to have slipped into the pillar of the candle. It doesn’t Flickr and it looks a little strange. A bit disappointing as like only had them a couple of days. The rest are fine
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets and one remote does work for both. That was important for me. The candles are great with the timer function. I have them set to come on at 6 pm for 4 hours. Don't even have to think about it. I have rechargeable batteries which is important since I run then every night. The flicker function makes then even more realistic. Love the candles.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey K.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but not all candles worked
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like the candles and remote option. I was surprised to know they feel like real wax and it’s nice they have a flicker option. Unfortunately 2 of the batter doors didn’t stay closed. Luckily it came with an extra. But that still leaves me with one candle that doesn’t have a back. Also one of the candles doesn’t work which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: C L E

customer_reviews.title: These are a JOKE!
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't read the exact size of these LED candles because I thought they were bigger, but when I got them in the mail today, they are so skinny and small! I am not pleased with them at all. Be sure you read the exact dimensions before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce G

customer_reviews.title: Awful product. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Very poorly made. One came apart before using, another melted (yes melted) and the battery to the remote was burned out before use. Awful you cannot return these. So much for following all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty , and batteries last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I put these candles out for Christmas and I loved the look , it calls for 2 AA batteries I didn’t think they would last long . But they lasted a really long time. They last double the time if you keep them on low , which is plenty bright, like a candle glow , I would highly recommend , oh , and the remote control is great to change settings or on and off ,,,
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the flickering effect. I purchased the ivory it’s really beautiful. I purchased one set, after they were delivered I was so impressed I ordered two more sets. The packing was very Secure with both deliveries. I think the price is good especially since they’re LED which is designed to last for years to come with proper care. With all the features included they’re a great benefit for me. Thank you, Amazon and the Seller for giving great value, and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Pibbbi

customer_reviews.title: Look close to real!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing can ever beat an open flame candle but these add warmth, romance and light in any room. They are in graduated sizes and look nice in an arrangement, almost as if some had burned down and some haven't. The edges are not flat so again have a realistic touch, like a partially burned pillar candle. Love the handy remote, it comes with two!
customer_reviews.author: KF in TN

customer_reviews.title: rustic looking great for rooms with real wood walls
customer_reviews.text: So these are real wax on the outside, I love this. They look exactly as pictured. The remote is awesome when you are wanting to relax, also the auto timer on the remote is good so you can turn them on and not have to remember to turn off, they flicker like real candles, Almost all the goodness of real candles without the danger for the kiddos not if they could just make some that you can use essentials ouls with so that you could get the good aroma it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!  A must buy, great gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot rave about this brand enough, The best flicker candle, love the hi/lo function, very real looking and you get 9.. 2 remotes, I got my sister in law and my mom to buy a set and they wish they had gotten more, This is also a great gift. I have had other brands, but not nearly as nice. Well done
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought several sets of these to put all over my mantel and up the staircase during the holiday season. There were a few duds in the lot... maybe four or five of them that wouldn't go on/off with the remote, unless I picked them up and gently banged them down. But for the most part, I really enjoyed them. I will definitely take all the batteries out and pack them away to use again next year. (PS I was going to give one box as a gift, but ended up using it myself because of the duds.)
customer_reviews.author: Bunkster Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great candles!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They have an actual wax around the outside of the pillar so they feel and look very real. My only complaint is the light is VERY orange, unnaturally orange. It helps to use the "dim" function to make it look a little more realistic, but I would have preferred a more yellow toned light.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Candles without Setting Anything on Fire
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this is a very nice set that I've purchased a couple of times. Provides the ambient glow of candles without the open flame. The remote provides easy control. One note of warning: These guys are made of wax and if you live in an area that gets warm, they can warp in the heat of the delivery truck.
customer_reviews.author: Dubliner

customer_reviews.title: Needs 2 AA batteries each
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product, I love the timer setting so I set it on the timer and go to sleep and it turns off on its own it’s just fabulous, I’ve always loved candles and have had a few incidents of burning things these are made of wax and has a flickering setting so I get all the ambience of a real candle without burning the house down and live that they come with two remotes so I can use some candles in different places . 100% five stars
customer_reviews.author: tequilla

customer_reviews.title: Dimmable, timer options good
customer_reviews.text: I really like these candles so far. They are skinny, which means they fit in my holders better than some thick pillars. I love that I can change the flame from a steady burn to a realistic flicker. The 2, 4, 6 hour options are good, too. And I was pleasantly surprised to discover that they are dimmable as well. My only complaint is that the color is very orange, and not a yellowish glow that would be slightly more natural looking. But all-in-all, I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Not all worked
customer_reviews.text: Hi. These are beautiful but not all worked out of the box. If they all worked, it would be very pretty. Meanwhile, I will eat the cost as I don’t have the time to re-package it all to return them (as offered by Amazon). Couldn’t find the customer service of manufacturers to call. Otherwise they look very real. If you have time to take a chance, and patience to deal with any needed replacements, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ragdoll

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: These candles are awesome. At first I thought I'd be going through batteries at a rapid pace. Not so. I run mine eight hours a day, with the flicker on, and in the three months I've had them...I haven't had to change the batteries once. Don't know if I can endorse another product here, but I use IKEA batteries to save money and, like I said, 720 hours of non-stop faux candle light later, their still going strong. The remote control gives you a ton of options and one remote will work at least two groups (or more) of candles with separate programs. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hyndrich

customer_reviews.title: Ambiance At The Touch Of A Button!  Makes A Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself and loved them so much I got a set for my mother, my aunt, and my sister-in-law! The price was great, they're LEDs so they'll last (although you do need 18 AA batteries, but the investment is with it!). I love the timer, I love the flicker option, and I love the remote control. I can create ambiance at the push of a button. Great buy. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Salena Lettera

customer_reviews.title: These candles are impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These candles are impressive! They look and feel shockingly real when both on an off. They are also very sophisticated. They not only have a remote control that allows you to turn all of them off and on in an instant (there's 9 total), but it doesn't stop there. These candles have a timer function which allows the off/on to be automated, and the brightness of the candles can be adjusted too. They really are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Beatles Lover

customer_reviews.title: Skinny Sticks
customer_reviews.text: The selection is nice, but they are not exactly pillar candles, which usually are about 5 or 6 inches around. These are about 2 or 3 inches diameter, making them seem more like really fat tapers. So of you are attempting to place them on a typical pillar holder, these won't work.
customer_reviews.author: SwampyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the most part. Received one broken candle.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two packs, I just got batteries to put in them and unboxed them all, one of the candles was cracked and upon sitting it on the table, not even hard, it fell apart. The one that fell apart doesn’t even work or I would just glue it back together. It’s not worth it to send it back just for one, I wish I could just replace the broken one
customer_reviews.author: Randall Snapp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes, both boxes are different colors and the largest candle in one box is melting the batteries... trying to contact the company to have them send me just a replacement candle so I don’t have to send a whole set back. The ones that work are beautiful even though they don’t match, some are orange and some are yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for our wedding
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use in lanterns that I borrowed for a wedding. Since I borrowed I didn't want to use real candles. These worked well. The different heights made for an attractive arrangement. Easy to use the remote to turn them all one before the wedding started. The only thing is that I assumed they were 3" diameter but they are closer to 2". I didn't see the diameter mentioned in the description. I got the ivory.
customer_reviews.author: ALMom^3

customer_reviews.title: Good but small
customer_reviews.text: These are a little on the small size, diameter wise. I guess I thought they would be larger. The only things is when you turn them off with the remote and back on they don’t remember that they were flickering at last power off, so you have to set this mode again. It would be nice if they remembered the preferred settings the last time they were on.
customer_reviews.author: D982

customer_reviews.title: 8 Were Great
customer_reviews.text: These are really beautiful candles and super easy to use with the remotes. They look very natural because of the wax material and the flicker setting is also very convincing. However, I was very disappointed to find out that the 9" candle in my set does not connect to the remote. I've tried to use both remotes, turning it off and on again, taking the batteries out, and anything else I could think of to get the candle to sync with the remote but nothing has worked.
customer_reviews.author: ajph

customer_reviews.title: Updating My Review
customer_reviews.text: Previously I had written a low-scoring review because I couldn't get the remote to work and the candles were stuck in "Light" mode. I was going to return them and decided to try one more time before packaging them up. I found that the remote worked if I got super close to the candles and held the remote at an angle. So it took a little more trial and error than I expected but now they're working just fine. The timer is also working well and the candles come on and go off as scheduled. Glad I didn't have to return them!
customer_reviews.author: Jan McDonnal

customer_reviews.title: Great VALUE but there are better LED candles
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and they are an AMAZING value. 9 LED candles with TWO remote controls. I decided to try a higher end set that came with only three candles for the same price (actually the 3 cost a bit more). There's a difference in the realism and the quality of light. So I guess it's up to you. These are still very nice, just for me personally I'd rather have quality than quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a few reviews that said the candles came broken or otherwise non-functioning. This was not the case for me. All of my candles worked every time. I used them as Christmas decor on my mantle and entertainment center. The remote was great, however, you do have to be at a particular angle to the candle for it to work. I assume if I had not wrapped the bases in garland that they would be much easier to use. I kept mine at the dimmest setting for a nice (not overpowering) ambiance. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Emilee Self

customer_reviews.title: Meh, they’re okay. Spotty candles.
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent. The remote works on a few candles. They don’t all turn on at the same time. Flicker and glow are okay. They are skinny, but okay in my fireplace. Just not really happy with the remote not working well. One doesn’t work at all. I’d swap but I don’t have the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great during power outage
customer_reviews.text: I gave this set to my parents and they love them. Not really so much for decorative value—which is fine- but we are rural, and when the electricity goes out they simply hit the remote and they have light. No open flames. Mom is on oxygen so I don’t have to worry about explosions or them burning down the dang house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Candle light on command!
customer_reviews.text: This set of candles looks great arranged in my fireplace. Every evening the timer starts them, they run for 4 hours and then shut off. It is so pleasant to have the warm, flickering candlelight in the fireplace when it’s too warm for a fire. The set is easy to set up and works well. I love that it can either flicker or not depending on your mood! Happy with this purchase and thinking it would make a good gift!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Look great, love that you can dim them
customer_reviews.text: These candles were perfect for our wedding reception where we couldn't have open flames. They look great, especially since they're real wax, and having the different dimming settings was so nice. They are narrower than a lot of real pillar candles, but that's what I wanted for our look. Just good to note in case you wanted wider ones. They're on our mantle now at home as a decoration!
customer_reviews.author: KathB

customer_reviews.title: LOOK AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING. I’m so impressed by the real wax and how incredible they look when turned on. From a distance, you’d never even know they were fake. Love the remote control feature. I just set them up so I haven’t used the timing feature yet, but sounds simple enough. If you’re looking for a sign to purchase these, do it!! Exactly what I was looking for to start decorating for Halloween (yes, in August). I have them in my fireplace, but you could use them anywhere and they’d look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am such a candle person but after awhile it gets expensive to keep up with my constant need to burn one. These give off no smell or anything but the light is so romantic and cozy! Not to mention the fact you can dim them — that’s awesome. They’re lightweight and easy to move around and feel like real candles. The remotes also come with batteries in them to Start
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Looks good,  but one is broken
customer_reviews.text: These candles look great, but one is broken. I can see that one of the wires is not connected to the switch, but I can't disassemble it to fix it myself. I don't really want to go through the hassle of returning it for one candle... oh well. The remote works nicely through the glass cover of my fireplace, and gives you several operation options (steady light vs. flickering, brightness, timer). The light color is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: These candles are beautiful and very realistic
customer_reviews.text: These candles are beautiful and very realistic. Timer feature is great bcs you set it and forget it. Beautiful ambiance for Christmas, or every day. I ordered 3 sets of them. Batteries have lasted more than a month and still going when times to light 4-6 hours a day. Great value for money. You get 5 candles for what it might cost you for 1 at pottery barn.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice candles but small
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty nice quality and look good on mantle but they are much smaller in diameter than I anticipated and they do not work for the purpose I purchased them for and had to buy some locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just The Most Realistic Electric Flickering Candles
customer_reviews.text: These are just the best battery operated candles. They use 2 AAA batteries (not tiny hearing aid batteries) which give them long life. How realistic is just mind boggling, please don't burn yourself. Guaranteed you will love these and the small remote that includes automatic on / off ability.
customer_reviews.author: West Palm Beach Joe

customer_reviews.title: Loved the capabilities but not the orange light
customer_reviews.text: I liked the candles how they Flickr like real flames and I love how a remote control controls the flame, the brightness of the flame and has a timer and on/off capabilities. What I didn't like enough to return them is that the flame bulb is orange, very orange. It's not a realistic look at all to me. It's a dark orange reminds me of the lighting at an amusement park pirate ride.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Saver

product_meta.title: Vinkor Flameless Candles Flickering Candles Birch Bark Set of 4"5"6" Battery Candles Real Wax Pillar with Remote Timer
feature_bullets: A COMPLETE SET OF FLAMELESS CANDLES: This value pack comes with 3 beautiful flameless pillar candles, 1 remote control with 10 different keys and a super easy to follow operating manual. Specifically, this set includes a 4" pillar, a 5" pillar and a 6" pillar (each 3.25" diameter) candle, all coming in an elegant ivory white color that matches any house. (Batteries are not included in this package.)

ENERGY SAVING, POWERFUL LEDS: These impressive candles require 2 AA batteries per candle, that are expected to last for about 150 hours, while the lifetime of the led lamps is up to 50,000 hours. Unlike real candles, these flameless pillar candles are made to last; you buy them once, you have them forever!

HASSLE FREE OPERATION: For easy operation from the comfort of your sofa or bed, you will also receive one remote control with range 16.4ft that operates all candles. This 10-key remote control allows you to set timer on your pillar flameless candles per 2H, 4H, 6H, or 8H, while you can even time them to automatically turn on or off. With this super convenient remote you can enjoy the relaxation of your candles without worries!

SAFETY COMES FIRST: With amazing flameless candle set you can have perfect ambient evenings with peace of mind; no worries about fire hazards, smoke, messy dripping wax or stained tablecloth. These kid-friendly white flameless candles are a great choice for any family with children or pets who want to make sure that their little ones will stay safe and sound.

THE PERFECT DECORATING FLAMELESS CANDLES: These incredibly realistic flickering LED candles are a beautiful addition to any dinner table, party, bedside table, Christmas decoration and so much more. The flame stimulation technology makes these wonderful candles sway and flicker so beautifully and convincingly, that you and your guests will be definitely impressed!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars883 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
